CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Emerald Capital relative to Horizon Funding?
SRP.A: Emerald Capital is {below} Horizon Funding in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total mortgage rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aura Finance}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total mortgage rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sapphire Loans}.

VE.Q: What is Sapphire Loans's Mortgage Rate in 1965?
VE.A: Sapphire Loans's mortgage rate in 1965 is {4.02} %.

VE.Q: What is Titan Lending's Mortgage Rate in 1983?
VE.A: Titan Lending's mortgage rate in 1983 is {22.25} %.

VE.Q: What is Emerald Capital's Mortgage Rate in 1982?
VE.A: Emerald Capital's mortgage rate in 1982 is {2.09} %.

VE.Q: What are the mortgage rate of Sapphire Loans, Emerald Capital, and Apex Credit in 1975?
VE.A: Sapphire Loans's mortgage rate is {1.40} %, Emerald Capital's mortgage rate is {2.80} %, Apex Credit's mortgage rate is {2.81} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Mortgage Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum mortgage rate is {0.45} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Mortgage Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum mortgage rate is {29.60} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Mortgage Rate level recorded for Apex Credit?
What is the lowest Mortgage Rate level recorded for Apex Credit?
EVJ.A: Apex Credit's lowest recorded level is approximately {1.45} % in {1986}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Mortgage Rate?
SC.A: The average total mortgage rate is {50.11} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Mortgage Rate go below 35.16 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Mortgage Rate exceed 57.69 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Mortgage Rate fall between 44.11 and 48.75 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1966 and 1983, did the total Mortgage Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1972 and 1983?
NC.A: The change in total mortgage rate between 1966 and 1983 was {larger} than between 1972 and 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1975, was the average total Mortgage Rate higher or lower than between 1982 and 1986?
NC.A: The average total mortgage rate between 1970 and 1975 was {lower} than between 1982 and 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1986, was the average total Mortgage Rate higher or lower than between 1974 and 1983?
NC.A: The average total mortgage rate between 1975 and 1986 was {higher} than between 1974 and 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1974 and 1980, was the average total Mortgage Rate higher or lower than between 1969 and 1971?
NC.A: The average total mortgage rate between 1974 and 1980 was {higher} than between 1969 and 1971.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Aura Finance} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Sapphire Loans, Emerald Capital, Apex Credit, Horizon Funding, Starlight Loans, Aura Finance, Titan Lending}.
